get.description: Lists all of the available operations from Microsoft.Insights provider.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: AlertRules, Autoscale, etc.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of operations supported by the Microsoft.Insights provider.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Microsoft.Insights operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.
